changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.comment: Create an account for Microsoft Azure Active Directory based authentication when running on Azure
changeSet.sql: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbAadUsername}') CREATE USER [${fffsWebPortalStagingDbAadUsername}] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER

rollback.sql: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = N'${fffsWebPortalStagingDbAadUsername}') DROP USER [${fffsWebPortalStagingDbAadUsername}]
